abstract.text: Record or play audio, convert formats, parse audio streams, and configure your audio session.
Specifiers for the sample rate conversion algorithm, used for the
Specifiers for sample rate conversion quality, used for the
Converts audio data from one linear PCM format to another.
Gets an audio converter property value.
Gets information about an audio converter property.
Specifies priming information for an audio converter.
Sets the value of an audio converter object property.
Convert between linear PCM audio formats, and between linear PCM and compressed formats.
structures that describes applicable bit rates based on current settings.
structures that describes applicable sample rates based on current settings.
structures that describes the available bit rates based on the input format. You can determine the available bit rates using Audio Format Services.
values for the format and number of channels specified in the encoder’s input format.
structures that describes the available sample rates based on the input format. You can determine the available sample rates using Audio Format Services.
values that specify an input-to-output channel mapping.
The rendering quality of a codec. A

value that points to memory set up by the caller. This property is returned by the converter so that your application may store it along with the output data. This property can then be passed back to the converter for decompression at a later time.
value that points to memory set up by the caller. This property is required by some audio data formats in order to decompress the input data.
value that specifies an output sample rate.
value containing the number of bits per second to aim for when encoding data. Some decoders also allow you to query this property to discover the bit rate.
structure that specifies an audio converter’s input channel layout.
structure that specifies an audio converter’s output channel layout.
The priming method, usually for sample-rate conversion.
value that designates the source bit depth to preserve.

value that on input holds a size, in bytes, that is desired for the output data. On output, it holds the size, in bytes, of the input buffer required to generate that much output data. Note that some converters cannot do this calculation.

value that on input holds a size, in bytes, that is desired for the input data. On output, it holds the size, in bytes, of the output buffer required to hold the output data to be generated. Some converters cannot do this calculation.
Indicates whether the underlying codec supports resumption of processing following an audio interruption. A read-only
structures that describes the set of data formats produced by the encoder end of an audio converter.
The value of this property varies from format to format and is considered private to the format. It is treated as a buffer of untyped data.

Deprecated. The audio converter input callback may be passed any number of packets of data. If fewer are packets are returned than required, then the input proc is called again. If more packets are passed than required, they remain in the client’s buffer and are consumed as needed.
value that indicates the size, in bytes, of the largest single packet of data in the input format. This is mostly useful for variable bit rate compressed data (decoders).
value that indicates the size, in bytes, of the largest single packet of data in the output format. This is mostly useful for variable bit rate compressed data (encoders).
value that indicates the size, in bytes, of the smallest buffer of input data that can be supplied via the audio converter input callback or as the input to the
value that indicates the size, in bytes, of the smallest buffer of output data that can be supplied to AudioConverterFillComplexBuffer or as the output to AudioConverterConvertBuffer
The value of this property varies from format to format and is considered private to the format. It is treated as a buffer of untyped data.
A value that indicates the sample rate conversion algorithm.
The rendering quality of the sample rate converter.
